body: I'd be pleasantly surprised if any of the guys from 2 years ago are still checking the comments for your answer. Still, well-done @NotWearingPants

Initially their relationship wasn’t anything serious. But when the line was crossed and die was cast, girl found herself guilty upon encountering her friend. The latter noticed changes in former’s behavior and asked whether everything was alright. And that’s when last page enters the action with heroine’s sad expression which literally is amalgam of guilt, regret and slight hesitation of what to do next. The answer is almost two years due, but it’s an answer nonetheless.
Why did the last page seem a bit sad?
Don't you think the sister appers in the cover of Kanojo no Setsuna?
I like 2D girls. Not 3D nah that's disgusting
Even though the sister had nothing to do with this, I feel like she got cucked somehow... Incest doujins are a curse, I demand a sequel.
